text: Alexander Ferns (born 13 October 1968) is a Scottish actor and television personality. He is best known for his EastEnders role as Trevor Morgan, Rick Harper in BBC Scotland soap opera, River City and as Andrei Glukhov in the miniseries Chernobyl. Ferns was born in Lennoxtown, Scotland. ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:Scottish voice actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish television personalities Category:People from East Dunbartonshire
title: Alex Ferns
